attributes.action: change the new school cafeteria food served at schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This campaign is about getting old school dinners back to having fish and chips with salt on the table, also to get butter back at a lunch time.  Also to get back fruit juice and biscuits back at the end of school at boarding schools instead of milk and water with a piece of fruit.
